titleStmt.title: Descensus astrææ the device of a l'ageant [sic] borne before M. William Web, lord maior of the citie of London on the day he tooke his oath, beeing the 29. of October. 1591 : wherevnto is annexed a speech deliuered by one cladlike a sea nymph ... to the lord maior, at the time he tooke barge to go to Westminster / done by G. Peele ...
titleStmt.author: Peele, George, 1556-1596.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library (London, England)
